description:
A New Standard for Image Viewers

BandiView is the succeeding image viewer to Honeyview, that inherits everything cool of its predecessor and also gets improved even further. Fast and easy to view images in a variety of formats, from the most common ones to the most professional ones.
- Fixed a bug that the image converter cannot open a folder when the folder is dragged and dropped to the converter window
- Improved the image converter to be closed by the ESC key
- Fixed a bug that the right-click menu sometimes takes too long to appear
- Improved the image converter's UI
- Improved the way of entering dimensions of an image to be resized by the image converter
- Added a progress bar to the slideshow
- Other modifications
